Posts.Content: 98765 wrote: I was diagnosed IDC (1.2 cm) on August 13th. All my pains are severely magnified now, but I have had pain in my left hip for a while now, not bad and just a small spot. I am worried it has spread to my hip. This hip is on the opposite side of the breast with cancer. My friend who went through and beat breast cancer several years ago says this is unrelated. I feel great otherwise, except worrying about my breast cancer (emotionally). I feel like I would be really tired and have other symptoms if I was sicker or it had spread. Please give me reassurance! I am SO worried! :( Log in to post a reply
